horata sayin gahana eka kampas ayata nam echchara nuhuru wachanayak neme.ee tharamma me de ada kampas wala siddhawenawa.me langadi ruhunu wishwawidyalaye widyapitaye apuru siduwimak wartha wuna.pariganaka widya deshanayakadi horata gahapu sayin ekak mattuwima sambandhawa siddhiyak.me siddhiya wela thiyenne me langadi kampas aapu nangi kenekta.meya thamayi hora sayin eka gahala thiyenne wena kenekta.kohomahari me nangiwa deshanaya karapu sar paudgalikawa gennala ahala thiyenawa katada sayin eka gahuwe kiyala.meya eekata uththara dila na.ee tharahata eeta pahuwenida ema deshanayedima me nangita hamoma issaraha deshana shalawen pitawa yanna kiyala sar kiyala thiyenawa.eekata wiruddhawa ee welawe ee nangi ekkama deshanashalawe hitapu hamoma nagitala eliyata awilla.ithin oon ookata dan ambanak keslu.me awurudde bach thunama ekathu wela karanna hitapu fanshan ekakatath dan parmishan denna ba kiyanawalu me hethuwa nisa.me siddhi pelata kawuruda waga kiyanna oona?

rathnapura disthrikkaye raddalle nam gammanaye di sahodara sahodariyan 10 denekugen yuth pawulaka unwahanse upatha labuha. 1925 aprel 25 dina amuhenkanda shri wimalaramaye di pawidda labu unwahanse adhyapana katayuthu sandaha lankeya gihi pawidi pandiwarun rashiyakagema thothannak wu maligakanda widyodaya piriwenata athulath wuye prachina panditha upadhiya dina ganima dakwama ehi adhyapana katayuthu kalaha.
